question: Are gut microbiota profiles altered by irradiation?
ideal_answer: Yes, 	Irradiation profoundly impacted gut microbiota profiles

snippets.text: Specific Members of the Gut Microbiota are Reliable Biomarkers of Irradiation Intensity and Lethality in Large Animal Models of Human Health.
Irradiation profoundly impacted gut microbiota profiles in both animals.
Our findings suggest that gut symbiont-based probiotics can be used as agents for reversing radiation-induced ecological fitness decrease.
